# Three Wishes
## Overview
**Aura** strong universal or evocation (if *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]* is used); **CL** 20th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 120,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

This ring is set with three rubies. Each ruby stores a *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* spell, activated by the ring. When a *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* is used, that ruby disappears. For a randomly generated ring, roll 1d3 to determine the remaining number of rubies. When all the *wishes* are used, the ring becomes a nonmagical item.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]* or *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]*

**Cost** 97,500 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
